title: Revert Option Appears Twice in the Popup Menu
description: There are two Revert options in the menu.
OB: In the popup menu, the Revert option appears twice.
EB: The expected behavior is that only one instance of the Revert option should be displayed in the menu.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open the application.
2. Right-click anywhere to open the popup menu.
3. Observe that the Revert option is listed twice in the menu.
